nodes.text: Six Skirmishes on Corellian Trade Route
The Six Skirmishes on the Corellian Trade Route was a series of battles between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

Raiders associated with the CIS had been attacking Republic convoys on the Corellian Trade Route including five which hailed directly from Coruscant. The raiders' tactic was to use a gravity well to pull the ships from hyperspace and into an ambush for which the craft were unprepared. The fates of the crews are uncertain but one known casualty was Elsah'sai'Moro, who, having contacted the Jedi Council and told it of the loss, died shot down by the bounty hunter Aurra Sing.
